alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 01 at 8:05PM CDT until May 02 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS TUESDAY... .Gusty northwest winds with low to critically low relative humidities are expected Tuesday. Wind gusts of 20 to 30 mph are forecast tomorrow along with low relative humidities of 15 to 25 percent. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR CASS AND CROW WING COUNTIES... * AFFECTED AREA...In Minnesota, North Cass, South Cass and Crow Wing. * TIMING...This afternoon and evening, from noon to 8pm. * WINDS...North 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and become difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; South Cass
